相談方法は、症状や状況別で3つに分かれます: Advice offered here is divided into three categories, depending on your symptoms and situation.
かかりつけ医がいて症状のある方: You have a primary care doctor and are having symptoms
かかりつけ医がいない症状のある方: You do not have a primary care doctor and are having symptoms
軽い症状があり不安のある方: You are worried because you are having light symptoms
かかりつけ医がいて、発熱などの症状がある方: If you have a primary care doctor and are having symptoms
日ごろ受診されている医療機関に電話でご相談ください。: Please get consultation by telephone from the medical institution you usually use.
軽い症状があるなど不安のある方は、日ごろ受診されている医療機関に電話でご相談くだ: If you are anxious, please get consultation by telephone from the medical institution you usually use.
かかりつけ医がいない、発熱などの症状がある方: If you do not have a primary care doctor and are having symptoms

電話のおかけ間違いが多くなっております。発信の際は今一度電話番号をお確かめの上、: The number of calls to wrong numbers has been increasing. Please confirm the number before calling in order to prevent calling the wrong number.

医師が検査の必要性を判断いたします。: A physician determines that testing is necessary
マスクをして公共交通機関をできるだけ使わずに受診をしてください。: Avoid public transportation, wear a mask, and get tested.
医師により検査が必要だと判断されPCR検査を受けた結果: The results of the PCR test which was determined necessary by a physician
感染症指定医療機関等への入院、又は宿泊施設等での療養となります: You will be hospitalized at a medical institution designated for contagious diseases or housed in a lodging facility for medical treatment and recuperation.
自宅で安静に過ごし、必要に応じて医療機関を受診してください: Rest at home and seek treatment at a medical institution if necessary.
ただし、症状が良くならない場合は再度受診相談窓口またはかかりつけ医に相談してくだ: However, if symptoms do not improve, please consult the testing consultation desk or your primary doctor again.
